name: Epic Platformer FINAL
description:
Final version of my 'Epic Platformer' game - By Levi Donaldson

Credits:

All assets except the big blocks at level 2 (From Kenney) are made by me. All coding was done by me too.

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow keys - Movement

Z and in mid-air - Dash

X and have obtained the mask - Equip mask
